scriptedEmail.name: Forum Reply Suggested Answer
scriptedEmail.description: Defines the email sent to the thread author when a reply is marked as suggested.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body')) #token('author_name_link') #set($authorUrl = false) #set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.Author.Url) #if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.Author.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.Author.DisplayName #end #token('thread_subject_link') #set($thread = false) #set($thread = $core_v2_forumThread.Get($context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.ThreadId)) #if ($thread && !$thread.HasErrors()) $thread.Subject #else $context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.ThreadId #end #end $context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.Body('Email') #set($rejectUrl = false) #set($rejectUrl = $core_v2_forumUrls.RejectForumReply($context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.Id, false)) #set($acceptUrl = false) #set($acceptUrl = $core_v2_forumUrls.VerifyForumReply($context_v1_email.Context.ForumReply.Id, false)) #if ($rejectUrl && $acceptUrl)

#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_AcceptReject'))A #token('reject_answer_link') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Reject') #token('accept_answer_link') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Accept') #end

#end
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Accept">accept</resource> <resource name="Body">The following reply by {author_name_link} was suggested as an answer to {thread_subject_link}:</resource> <resource name="Body_AcceptReject">Did this answer your question? You can {accept_answer_link} or {reject_answer_link} it.</resource> <resource name="Footer">You received this notification because you subscribed to {forum_name_link}. To unsubscribe from only this thread, {mute_thread_link}.</resource> <resource name="Footer_ReportAbuse">{report_abuse_link}.</resource> <resource name="Mute">go here</resource> <resource name="Reject">reject</resource> <resource name="ReportAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Subject">Re: {thread_subject}: Suggested answer</resource> <resource name="Subject_WithMailingList">Re: [{mailing_list_name}] {thread_subject}: Suggested answer</resource> <resource name="Header">Re: {thread_subject}: Suggested answer</resource> <resource name="Header_WithMailingList">Re: [{mailing_list_name}] {thread_subject}: Suggested answer</resource> </language>
